stats.title: Achieve Instant Interoperability
stats.description: Optimized for performance. High TPS, ultra-low gas, and sub-second finality for real-time app execution.

features.title: Your App's Advantage with Push Chain
features.shared_state_description: Access account and state data from other chains in your smart contract.
features.programmable_solvers_description: Trigger, validate, and complete transactions across any chain using your smart contract.

feature_list.title: Shared State
feature_list.description: Access account and state data from other chains in your smart contract.

feature_list.title: Programmable Solvers
feature_list.description: Trigger, validate, and complete transactions across any chain using your smart contract.

feature_list.title: Universal Execution
feature_list.description: Transactions from any chain finalize on Push Chain, enabling users of any chain to natively use the same app.
